rooms.description: Spacious entry with reception area and wheelchair accessible ramp.
Modern living space with open-plan design featuring minimalistic furniture, ample natural lighting, and large windows aligned to the north for positive energy according to Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the living room; designed as an extension of the dining space with integrated seating.
Open balcony offering scenic views, wheelchair accessible via sliding door.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible with automatic sensor for ease of entry
Large, easy-to-use sliding door providing access to the balcony
